title: ...And Presumed Dead
description: Alpenstadt: city of the Alps. Beautiful, smiling, luxurious Alpenstadt.Deadly Alpenstadt...Two women went there in search of a man - to find out once and for all if he was still alive. Both of them were name Mrs. Thorpe.One found love, The other, a different kind of destiny...In this novel of suspense by Louise Fletcherr, author of the unforgettable Sorry Wrong Number, outdoes herself as a creator of brooding atmosphere, suspicious characters, and a completely gripping plot.
author: Lucille Fletcher
